title: Chapter 4313 - Chapter 4313: 4312 Was Sent Into The Cross-Shaped Primordial Spirit Zone
body:
Chapter 4313 - Chapter 4313: 4312 Was Sent Into The Cross-Shaped Primordial Spirit Zone

Chapter 4313: 4312 was sent into the cross-shaped primordial spirit zone

Translator: 549690339

“Each of you take a position and attack at the same time. That way, he can escape!”

“Sky Job, you and I will trap that fellow. Illusory realm, you will find an opportunity to send him into the cross-shaped primordial spirit zone!”

The spirit kneader stared at them and said!

“No Problem!”

Sky Job and illusory realm nodded.

They had been invited by the spirit kneader, so they were naturally prepared for everything!

“Let me predict it.”

The antennae on top of his head glowed as he spoke.

Since it involved a heavenly yuan creator who was stronger than him, he could only predict the insignificant problem.

As for whether he could kill the Dragon King with his prediction, he couldn’t predict it.

The other party was too strong.

“If we go from this direction, the other party can’t escape!”

Very soon, Heaven’s duty planned out three positions and spoke to the illusionary realm of the spirit kneader!

The two people from the illusionary realm of the spirit kneader nodded their heads. Their bodies moved and they immediately flew towards the two positions.

Following that, the three of them surrounded Wang Xian at the same time.

Their speed was very fast. After ten breaths, they had already sensed Wang Xian’s existence.

However, at this moment, Wang Xian, who was in front of the cross-shaped primordial spirit region, did not notice them immediately.

Wang Xian focused his attention on creating the divine dragon with ten attributes.

“Attack!”

At this moment, the spiritual kneader and the rest sensed Wang Xian’s location. Their eyes focused as they charged forward with killing intent.

When the energy in their bodies rose, Wang Xian instantly sensed something.

He turned around and immediately swept his gaze around!

“Damn you, you reptile. You actually dared to hurt me last time. This time, I will take your life!”

A cold voice filled with killing intent came from behind.

When Wang Xian heard this voice, his gaze froze slightly.

Spirit kneader!

This fellow actually came to take revenge on him?

His gaze immediately swept to two other places. He could sense that there were two existences at the Great Dao level there.

Although their strength was inferior to his, Wang Xian was completely no match for the three of them working together!

“Run!”

Wang Xian did not hesitate and immediately prepared to escape!

“You want to escape?”

A cold expression appeared on the spirit kneader’s face. He waved his arm and countless dark shadows covered Wang Xian, sealing off all his positions.

“Void God Burial!”

Tian Ji stared at Wang Xian and shouted in a low voice.

In the next moment, terrifying claws appeared beneath Wang Xian and clawed at him.

When Wang Xian saw the sudden attack and entanglement, his eyes narrowed!

Boom

He stomped his foot and a terrifying energy surged downwards.

He waved his arm and turned it into a dragon claw. Nine types of elemental energy blasted forward!

“Dragon King, don’t even think about escaping this time. Last Time, you joined forces with the song Pagoda Demon Sword to attack me. This time, I will make you pay ten times the price. I will make you die here!”

The Spirit kneader roared with a cold face. Behind him, countless black shadows emerged.

The Black Shadows attacked Wang Xian. They were densely packed and endless.

The spirit kneader unleashed all his strength without holding back!

He wanted to leave Wang Xian here completely!

He wanted to kill him completely!

When Wang Xian saw this scene, his expression changed slightly!

The strength of the spirit kneader was not as strong as him. However, with the addition of another great dao expert, it would be difficult for Wang Xian to resist!

Furthermore, there was another expert who had yet to make a move.

Buzz

Without any hesitation, Wang Xian moved his palm and a fleeing treasure appeared in his hand.

Wang Xian had many treasures that were used for escaping. All of them were obtained from the six paths universe.

He immediately opened a scroll.

A wisp of energy enveloped him.

Wang Xian saw that there was an additional path in front of him.

This path led to an extremely far location. However, he was able to take a step forward.

“Illusory realm, forbidden!”

“Illusory realm, illusory!”

However, at this moment, a cold voice was heard.

Following that, Wang Xian saw that the path in front of him disappeared instantly as though it had never appeared.

The scroll in his hand had lost its effect.

Upon seeing this scene, Wang Xian’s expression changed slightly!

However, a sense of crisis engulfed him immediately.

His gaze was fixed in front of him, but he could not sense the location of the crisis.

However, the crisis was still lingering in his heart.

There was some kind of mysterious and strange attack that was attacking him!

Wang Xian’s expression changed slightly. Without any hesitation, the energy in his entire body wrapped around his entire body.

The Tai Chi Dragon Plate on his body transformed into a dragon cannon. With the support of various types of energy, it looked extremely heavy!

It had an invincible defensive power!

Buzz

In the next instant, Wang Xian sensed an energy coming from in front of him.

This energy was extremely gentle, but it seemed to be enveloping the entire void around him!

He was within this encirclement!

As Wang Xian sensed this energy, he had a bad premonition in his heart!

Buzz

At this moment, he could feel his body rushing down rapidly!

This caused his expression to change slightly!

He rushed up quickly!

“Suppress him!”

Tian Gong roared in a low voice. With a wave of his arm, a sword of judgment appeared above Wang Xian and pressed down on him directly.

“Die, die, die, die!”

The spirit kneader let out an excited roar. Countless Phantoms were entangled in the void around Wang Xian.

Along with the Void and Wang Xian in the void, he was pulled down!

In addition, there was a vast force in the sky. It wanted to suppress Wang Xian’s body and make him fall into it.

Wang Xian sensed the force and his expression changed slightly.

He looked down and saw the area of the cross primordial spirit.

“Are they trying to push themselves into the area of the cross primordial spirit just to push themselves into it? What exactly are they trying to do to me?”

Wang Xian was bewildered.

What the other party was doing was not something he could fight against.

Although the current situation was better than the previous situation of the spirit kneader.

However, it wasn’t much better.

The opponent’s attacks were very strange!

Boom

In the next instant, Wang Xian’s body was thrown into the cross-shaped primordial spirit zone!

When Wang Xian entered the zone, the attacks of the spirit kneader and the rest disappeared as well!

He frowned slightly and didn’t fly out immediately. Instead, he fled upwards.

He moved his palm and created a space. The divination lamp appeared in front of him.

At the same time, waves of energy simulated his surroundings, allowing him to stay in the cross-shaped primordial spirit region for a longer period of time.

Buzz

A wave of energy was injected into the divination lamp.

Divination.

What would he encounter if he flew out of the cross-shaped primordial spirit region?

Buzz Buzz

The divination lamp emitted light and an image appeared!

The moment he went out, he would be attacked by three terrifying attacks.

Wang Xian looked at this scene and frowned slightly. He immediately flew into the distance.
